derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French collegial or late Latin collegialis, from collegium 'partnership, association' (see college)

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by or having authority vested equally among colleagues;

sentences.sentence: "a tendency to turn from collegial to one-man management"- Merle Fainsod

means.word_mean: 2. of or resembling or typical of a college or college students;
